title: TIPP Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Temperature Exploration
exercises.description: Experiment with cold and warm techniques in non-crisis moments to see what works best for you. Try ice cubes, cold water, warm bath, heating pad.

exercises.title: Exercise Burst
exercises.description: Create list of quick, intense exercises you can do anywhere: jumping jacks, jogging in place, short dance session. Practice when calm to build familiarity.

exercises.title: Breathing Practice
exercises.description: Practice paced breathing by inhaling slowly for 4 counts, holding for 4, then exhaling for 6-8 counts. This activates your parasympathetic nervous system to calm your body. Set aside five minutes daily using a timer or app.

exercises.title: Muscle Awareness
exercises.description: Progressive muscle relaxation involves tensing muscle groups for 5 seconds then releasing. Start with toes, work up through legs, abdomen, arms, shoulders, and face. Notice the contrast between tension and relaxation to identify stress patterns.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
